00202     /* emulate linux's sort by calling C library's qsort() */
00203     static inline void sort(void *base, size_t nmemb, size_t size, int (*cmp)(const void *, const void *), void *dummy) { (void)dummy; qsort(base, nmemb, size, cmp); }
